mapper.insert: insert into notice(notNo, notTitle, notContent, notWriteday, notCategory) values(seq_notice_notNo.nextval, #{notTitle}, #{notContent}, default, #{notCategory})
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where notCategory = '1'

select notNo ,notTitle, notContent, notWriteday, notCategory from ( select rownum AS rno , notNo ,notTitle, notContent, notWriteday, notCategory from ( select notNo ,notTitle, notContent, notWriteday, notCategory from notice order by notNo desc ) V ) T where notCategory = '1' and rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}
